trends: There has been one other sighting in Old Saybrook
There were no other sightings in Old Saybrook on or around November 16th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsTraveling in car.....noticed a streaking light, moving extremely fast. So fast, that object created a trail of light. A single object was followed down road...then rose into sky.....where two other objects were seen. In triangular formations, objects remained stationary..
Summary: Bright objects observed in Old Saybrook CT
